iplb_vrack_intro_text: Balance the load easily between the various services of your VLAN inside the vRack.
iplb_vrack_intro_text2_single: You can create another {{remainingNetworks}} private network(s).
iplb_vrack_intro_text2_plural: You can create another {{remainingNetworks}} private network(s).
iplb_vrack_intro_not_eligible: Your load balancer's configuration means it cannot currently be associated with a vRack.
iplb_vrack_rules_loading_error: An error occurred when loading information for the private network: {{message}}
iplb_vrack_private_network_loading_error: An error occurred when loading the private network: {{message}}
iplb_vrack_private_networks_loading_erro: An error occurred when loading the private networks: {{message}}
iplb_vrack_associate_vrack_error: An error occurred when associating the vRack: {{message}}
iplb_vrack_deassociate_vrack_error: An error occurred when deactivating the vRack: {{message}}
iplb_vrack_private_network_add_error: An error occurred when adding the private network: {{ message }}
iplb_vrack_private_network_edit_success: The private network has been modified.
iplb_vrack_private_network_edit_error: An error occurred when modifying the private network: {{ message }}
iplb_vrack_private_network_add_edit_fiel: 1 - 4000 (0 if the private network is not in a VLAN)
iplb_vrack_private_network_delete_text: Are you sure you want to delete the private network {{ network }}?
iplb_vrack_private_network_delete_succes: The private network has been deleted.
iplb_vrack_private_network_delete_error: An error occurred when deleting the private network: {{message}}
